OwnerInput.description: The owner of the resource. If you provide this, do not specify an owner_id as it will be generated automatically. When updating a wallet, you can set the owner to null to remove the owner.

oneOf.description: The P-256 public key of the owner of the resource, in base64-encoded DER format. If you provide this, do not specify an owner_id as it will be generated automatically.
oneOf.title: Public key owner

oneOf.description: The user ID of the owner of the resource. The user must already exist, and this value must start with "did:privy:". If you provide this, do not specify an owner_id as it will be generated automatically.
oneOf.title: User owner

OwnerIdInput.description: The key quorum ID to set as the owner of the resource. If you provide this, do not specify an owner.

ExternalOAuthProviderID.description: The ID of an external OAuth provider.
ExternalOAuthProviderID.title: ExternalOAuthProviderID

PrivyOAuthProviderID.description: The ID of a Privy app as an OAuth provider. Must start with "privy:".
PrivyOAuthProviderID.title: PrivyOAuthProviderID

CustomOAuthProviderID.description: The ID of a custom OAuth provider, set up for this app. Must start with "custom:".
CustomOAuthProviderID.title: CustomOAuthProviderID

OAuthProviderID.description: The ID of an OAuth provider.
OAuthProviderID.title: OAuthProviderID

user_id.description: The ID of the Privy user.

override_policy_ids.description: The array of policy IDs that will be applied to wallet requests. If specified, this will override the base policy IDs set on the wallet.

id.description: Unique ID of the wallet. This will be the primary identifier when using the wallet in the future.

public_key.description: The compressed, raw public key for the wallet along the chain cryptographic curve.

created_at.description: Unix timestamp of when the wallet was created in milliseconds.

policy_ids.description: List of policy IDs for policies that are enforced on the wallet.

owner_id.description: The key quorum ID of the owner of the wallet.

exported_at.description: Unix timestamp of when the wallet was exported in milliseconds, if the wallet was exported.

imported_at.description: Unix timestamp of when the wallet was imported in milliseconds, if the wallet was imported.

PolicyCondition.description: A condition that must be true for the rule action to be applied.
PolicyCondition.title: PolicyCondition

PolicyAction.description: Action to take if the conditions are true.

PolicyRequestBody.description: Unique ID of the policy to take actions on.

PolicyRuleRequestParams.description: Unique IDs of the policy and the rule within the policy to take actions on.

version.description: Version of the policy. Currently, 1.0 is the only version.

id.description: Unique ID of the created policy. This will be the primary identifier when using the policy in the future.

owner_id.description: The key quorum ID of the owner of the policy.

created_at.description: Unix timestamp of when the policy was created in milliseconds.

ConditionSetRequestParams.description: Unique ID of the condition set to take actions on.

ConditionSetItemRequestParams.description: Unique IDs of the condition set and the condition set item within the condition set to take actions on.

name.description: Name to assign to condition set.

id.description: Unique ID of the created condition set. This will be the primary identifier when using the condition set in the future.

owner_id.description: The key quorum ID of the owner of the condition set.

created_at.description: Unix timestamp of when the condition set was created in milliseconds.

name.description: Name to assign to condition set.

ConditionSetItemsRequestBody.description: Array of values to add to the condition set. Maximum 100 items per request.

id.description: Unique ID of the created condition set item.

condition_set_id.description: Unique ID of the condition set this item belongs to.

value.description: The value stored in this condition set item.

created_at.description: Unix timestamp of when the condition set item was created in milliseconds.

next_cursor.description: Cursor for pagination. Null if there are no more items.

hash.description: The hash to sign. Must start with `0x`.

oneOf.title: Bytes
oneOf.description: Hash and sign bytes using the specified encoding and hash function.

bytes.description: The bytes to hash and sign.

encoding.description: The encoding scheme for the bytes.

hash_function.description: The hash function to hash the bytes.

schema.description: Provide either `hash` (to sign a pre-computed hash) OR `bytes`, `encoding`, and `hash_function` (to hash and then sign). These options are mutually exclusive.
schema.title: raw_sign

post.description: Request a price quote for an asset that may be used to execute a trade later on. The quote will be valid for a limited time as specified in the response.

200.description: Quote request successful. Returns quote details including pricing and expiration.

get.description: Gets the status of a quote that was previously requested.

schema.description: Unique identifier for the quote from Kraken.
The ID of the Privy user.

put.description: Execute a previously requested quote to complete the trade. The quote must be in "new" status and not expired.

schema.description: Unique identifier for the quote from Kraken.

post.description: Create a new Kraken Embed user associated with a Privy user. This establishes the mapping between the Privy user and the Kraken IIBAN.

schema.description: The ID of the Privy user.

200.description: Kraken user created successfully. Returns the IIBAN for the newly created user.

get.description: Retrieve information about a Kraken Embed user including their status and required actions.

schema.description: The ID of the Privy user.

post.description: Submit identity verification details for a Kraken Embed user. Supports various verification types including identity documents, residence documents, tax IDs, selfies, watchlists, and KYC reports.

schema.description: The ID of the Privy user.
Empty response on successful verification submission.

post.description: Submit identity verification details for a Kraken Embed user using presigned URLs to documents. This endpoint accepts JSON payloads with URLs to verification documents instead of multipart file uploads. Supports identity documents, residence documents, tax IDs, selfies, and watchlists.

schema.description: The ID of the Privy user.

200.description: Verification submitted successfully. Returns the verification ID for tracking.

get.description: Get a list of all available assets for trading on Kraken Embed, with optional filtering and pagination.

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific asset including pricing, market data, and trading capabilities.

schema.description: The asset identifier (e.g., BTC, ETH)
Quote currency for pricing information.
RFC5646 language tag for localized content.

result.description: Bitcoin is the world's largest cryptocurrency project.

get.description: Get historical price rates for a specific asset with optional time range and interval filtering.

schema.description: The asset identifier (e.g., BTC, ETH)

get.description: Get detailed portfolio information for a user including asset balances, values, and positions.

get.description: Get historical balances and valuations over time for a user's portfolio with optional filtering by assets and date range.

schema.description: The ID of the Privy user.

get.description: Get transaction history for a user's portfolio with filtering and pagination options.

schema.description: The ID of the Privy user.

post.description: Currently, this is a master-only operation. Therefore, no User parameter exists.
